snippet: There may be no college leader in the country as well prepared to face a sexual assault controversy than Biddy Martin, who has a history of tackling thorny disputes.
abstract: Amherst College campus has been engulfed in sexual assault controversy, and few college leaders are as well prepared as its president Biddy Martin, who has written extensively on gender and sexuality and has history of tackling thorny disputes; Martin has been lauded for her response to incidents.
lead_paragraph: There may be no college leader in the country as well prepared to face a sexual assault controversy than Biddy Martin, who has a history of tackling thorny disputes.

headline.seo: Amherst President Tackles Sexual Assault Crisis
headline.main: Sexual Assaults Roil Amherst, and College President Welcomes the Controversy
headline.print_headline: Sexual Assaults Roil Amherst, and College President Welcomes the Controversy
